sqlMap.select: select num,emp_num,work_on,work_off,work_time,h_work,workout,lateness,early,division,ip,r from (select num,emp_num,work_on,work_off,work_time,h_work,workout,lateness,early,division,ip,rownum r from work where emp_num=#emp_num# order by num desc) where rownum <= 1
select num,emp_num,work_on,work_off,work_time,h_work,workOut,lateNess,early,division,ip from work where emp_num= #emp_num# order by num desc
sqlMap.insert: insert into work(num,emp_num,work_on,work_off,work_time,h_work,workOut,lateNess,early,division,ip) values( work_seq.nextval, #emp_num#, sysdate, sysdate, '00:00', '00:00', '00:00', '00:00', '00:00', #division#, #ip# )
sqlMap.update: update work set work_off=sysdate where num=#num#
update work set work_time=#work_time# where num=#num#
update work set early=#early# where num=#num#
